main event: A bright glow was observed in the sky over Mapleton, Maine on October 29, 2029.
interesting points: The sighting involved three unidentified objects moving in a South to North direction., The observation lasted over a period of time., The source of the sighting was a civilian., There was no physical evidence or photographs present., The reported event was documented in a Project Blue Book report.
sighted object: three unidentified objects emitting a bright glow
